siteTitle: JungleCode - Navigate Japan's Healthcare Market with Confidence

hero.title: Transform Healthcare in Japan
hero.subtitle: Enter the world's third-largest healthcare market with the expertise to navigate PMDA rules, build trust, and deliver patient impact.

about.title: You Bring Innovation. We Navigate Japan.
about.description: JungleCode is your catalyst for healthcare success in Japan - a trusted broker, localization expert, and regulatory strategist. We bridge your innovations with Japan's urgent healthcare transformation needs. Our strength comes from combining deep technical expertise with decades of experience in PMDA navigation, clinical workflows, and cultural fluency. We do not just translate. We adapt your solution for Japan's unique ecosystem to ensure clinical resonance and commercial viability.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To accelerate adoption of transformative healthcare technologies in Japan - improving patient outcomes while navigating regulation and culture with precision and care.

keyPoints.title: Healthcare Expertise
keyPoints.description: We understand Japan's healthcare system - from PMDA to hospital hierarchies - and guide your technology to adoption and reimbursement.

keyPoints.title: Regulatory Guidance
keyPoints.description: From device classification to Shonin approval and NHI reimbursement, we simplify complex processes and shorten time to market.

keyPoints.title: Provider Access
keyPoints.description: We connect you with hospitals, KOLs, and decision-makers who can champion your solution in Japan's consensus-driven system.

challenges.title: Healthcare Challenges We Solve
challenges.intro: Japan's healthcare market is complex - from PMDA approvals to risk-averse providers and strict data rules. We help you break through with clear strategies and trusted local ties.

challenges.title: NHI Coverage
challenges.challenge: National Health Insurance requires proof of cost-effectiveness or clinical superiority before coverage.
challenges.solution: We prepare health economics cases, guide Chuikyo negotiations, and position you for favorable reimbursement.

challenges.title: Pricing Pressure
challenges.challenge: Innovation value must balance with cost controls and biennial price revisions.
challenges.solution: We design pricing that captures early value while ensuring long-term sustainability.

challenges.title: Risk-Averse Culture
challenges.challenge: Providers require local evidence, KOL endorsement, and consensus before adoption.
challenges.solution: We build credibility through KOLs, generate Japanese clinical data, and navigate decision-making with cultural fluency.

challenges.title: Hospital Integration
challenges.challenge: Japanese hospitals run on unique EMRs and workflows with limited interoperability.
challenges.solution: We adapt your solution for major EMR vendors, align with workflows, and support technical deployment.

challenges.title: PMDA Approval
challenges.challenge: Device classification, Shonin approval, and trials are complex, costly, and slow.
challenges.solution: We map pathways, manage PMDA consultations, leverage Sakigake fast-tracks, and plan evidence to speed approvals.

challenges.title: Data Privacy
challenges.challenge: Japan's PIPA and medical data rules are among the strictest worldwide.
challenges.solution: We ensure compliance, design strong security, and protect patient data while keeping workflows efficient.

services.title: Market Entry Services
services.subtitle: From PMDA to reimbursement, we guide every step of Japan market entry.

primary.title: Regulatory Strategy
primary.description: Navigate Japan's regulatory system with confidence. We guide PMDA pathways, clinical validation, and positioning for approval and reimbursement.
features: Japanese trial design and evidence generation
Medical advisory boards and KOL engagement

secondary.title: Provider Engagement
secondary.description: Build strong relationships with Japan's medical community through introductions, validation, and engagement.

secondary.title: Localization & Adaptation
secondary.description: Adapt your solution for Japan's clinical environment - beyond translation to true integration.

steps.title: Regulatory Assessment
steps.description: We assess classification, map requirements, and define evidence for approval.

steps.title: Market Planning
steps.description: We design strategies for validation, provider engagement, submissions, and reimbursement.

steps.title: Pilots & Launch
steps.description: From PMDA submissions to hospital pilots, we support implementation and manage relationships.

steps.title: Scale & Optimize
steps.description: We expand adoption, optimize reimbursement, and build sustainable operations.

whyJapan.title: Why Japan
whyJapan.intro: Japan's super-aged society and workforce shortage make it the most urgent testbed for next-gen healthcare. With government backing and strong demand, the market is ready for proven innovation.

sections.title: Market Dynamics
items: 28% of population over 65, rising to 35% by 2040
Society 5.0 investing trillions of yen in digital health

sections.title: Strategic Advantages
items: Government mandate for digital health and AI
Culture of precision aligning with medical standards

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.subtitle: Work with partners who understand both clinical and cultural complexity - from PMDA to hospital adoption.

contact.title: Request Consultation
contact.subtitle: Share your innovation and timeline. We will outline your path to approval, adoption, and success in Japan.

formPlaceholders.name: Full name
formPlaceholders.industry: e.g., Digital therapeutics, Medical AI, Remote monitoring, Clinical diagnostics, Digital pathology
formPlaceholders.objectives: What outcomes and goals do you aim to achieve in Japan?

footer.tagline: Your catalyst for healthcare innovation in Japan.

team.name: Jet Villegas
team.bio: A builder, operator, and investor with 25+ years in global technology and healthcare. Jet has led engineering operations in Tokyo and San Francisco, bridging medical AI with Japan's strict regulatory system. His expertise spans healthcare software, device localization, and workflow integration. He brings deep ties with hospitals and regulators that help US and European companies succeed in Japan. His mission: advance patient care through technology that fits Japan's ecosystem.

team.name: Aditya Pandya
team.bio: A product leader with 15+ years in digital platforms and 5+ years in Japan. While in Tokyo, he scaled global platforms reaching over 100M people, including healthcare-adjacent products, while navigating regulatory and cultural complexities. His career includes building products in highly regulated environments, with a focus on privacy, safety, and global scalability.
